snippet: As Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg departs, Jobs for New York, a political action committee, is throwing its support behind allies who are pro-development.
abstract: Jobs for New York, a political action committee financed by interests eager to ensure that the pro-business, pro-jobs and pro-development policies of Mayor Michael R Bloomberg outlive his term, unleashes torrent of spending to support pro-business candidates for the City Council.
lead_paragraph: As Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg departs, Jobs for New York, a political action committee, is throwing its support behind allies who are pro-development.

headline.main: Group Financed by Business Leaders Has Put Nearly $7 Million Into Council Races
headline.print_headline: Group Financed by Business Leaders Has Put Nearly $7 Million Into Council Races
